column6: Description(synopsis)
Taiwo, a car dealer, captivated by Sarah, a politician's daughter, faces heartbreak when her affection turns cold. As he struggles, a glimmer of hope emerges.
It is all love and betrayal as Grace entangled with her ex and sinks in a dilemma with her fiancée just weeks to their wedding. Their unwavering love is put to the test.
Aching for vengeance against her polygamous father, who consistently abuses her mother, a brilliant 19-year-old embarks on a journey to learn boxing, but her mother has other plans.

column2: Stolen Daughters: Kidnapped By Boko Haram
column6: In their voices, the freed female hostages detail their lives in captivity and how their lives have changed since their release. The film puts the Chibok incident in context and describes Boko Haram's activities and battle for the north.
After Ada is served breakfast and her ex-running away with her money, she meets Ben who suffers the same fate.
Modi and Rama boards a ship to France on a stow a way mission. Upon arrival, they realize they are still in Mombasa.
A party girl fights to survive after three thieves commandeer her luxury yacht. Trapped on the high seas, she turns the tables on the intruders and takes matters into her own hands.
Straight Outta Compton is a biopic that chronicles the rise of the ground-breaking gangsta-rap group N.W.A.  2015
Two deceitful individuals collide in this comedic drama, weaving a web of lies until reality shatters their illusions.
When a mother gives birth to a set of twins with different characters, drama can never seize from her home.
Passionate about her craft, a screenwriter gets more than she bargained for when she magically slips into the life of one of her characters.
Will Ferrell and Jamie Foxx lead a starry voice cast in this hilarious canine comedy. An abandoned dog teams up with other stray dogs to exact revenge on the owner who abandoned him.
Gandoki promise his wife, Maggie, the whole world, this makes her love him so much that they get married. It later turn sour as Gandoki unleashes unimaginable hate on his family.
When a farm girl has an altercation with a foreigner upon her arrival in Gauteng, she is shocked that he is also the best man at the wedding where she is the bridesmaid.
A powerful South African drama. A group of women in a support group travel to the Orange River for their "veldskool" trip where many trials, tribulations and truths are revealed.
A charming lady is trapped in the same house with her best friend's fiancé during Covid 19 lock down.
Sheila loves her brother Ben so much that she can not stand him getting married to another woman.
Dennis is fixated on his childhood crush and will do whatever it takes, even if it means breaking up her family, to win her back.
Amaechi refuse to study and ask his father to create a success charm to pass his exams, but will he still pass after the charms?
A young, impoverished couple's situation worsens when the man is kidnapped, and his wife is asked to pay a huge ransom. She sets off on a perilous quest to save her husband.
Young, successful female barrister must confront her childhood traumas after meeting a brilliant, free-spirited paralegal who inspires her healing journey.
The documentary tells the story of Bindle & Keep, a Brooklyn-based custom-suit company that is helping members of the LGBTQ community embrace their identities and look the way they feel.
A heartwarming drama set during World War II. With the war raging, a writer is left to look after a young boy who slowly wins her heart after initially wanting to get rid of him. 2018

column2: Super Greed: The Fight For Football
column6: The story of how 12 of Europe's elite football clubs planned to form a breakaway 'super league', which was met with protests and condemnation and collapsed in just 48 hours.
An animated adventure based on the classic Mario video game franchise. With Princess Peach's help, Mario journeys through the Mushroom Kingdom to stop the all-powerful Bowser. 2023
Fans of Twister will be taken by this danger-filled storm movie. A teenage boy runs away to follow his father's footsteps, legendary storm chaser Bill Brody.
Superworm is super-long and super-strong, and is always saving the day. But who can save him when he is captured by the evil Wizard Lizard? Based on the book by Julia Donaldson (The Gruffalo).
It takes a lot to be married and remain married, words of a friend to another. This leads a man robbing his wife and staking some money in a bet.
Ncholo the local maid is convinced by her boss Scarlet to be a surrogate mother and is promised money after the process, Nine months after, Ncholo refuse to give back the babies.
A poignant South African film about three adopted sisters who are reunited by their mother's death. This film has laughter, crying, beautiful places and interesting characters.
Obsessed with climbing the social ladder, a couple arranges a marriage for their daughter, thinking it's their ticket to success. Fate has other plans in store.
An origin story set in contemporary Cape Flats gangland, a town contaminated with crime and corruption and controlled by its feared ruler and Muay Thai warrior, The Kingpin.
Kayode Umar, a talented musician, grapples with Body Integrity Identity Disorder (BIID), a condition where individuals dislike their seemingly perfect bodies.
A group of girls that decide to do whatever it takes to make money, they swear to use every means to get wealth.
A young girl pay a boys school fees when they were younger, and now he is back disguised as a servant just to get close to and help her.
Lilly is a small-time fashion designer, does all she can to meet the biggest influencer in Nigeria who can change her brand and financial fortunes forever.
Despite all a lady does and having an affair with her husband's best friend, he loves her still. But the table turns when her child's father shows up.
A man crosses paths with a dirty cop and an assassin when he scoops up a bag of cash following a fatal car accident.
Following her father's death, Arthur and Mrs. Evelyn take every precaution to shield Charlotte from deceitful suitors.
Elaine Williams has her inner gps set on kroes control. When things fall apart - literally - will she have what it takes to embrace the rocky, bumpy, path less taken?
A gripping cat-and-mouse thriller. Kidnapped and separated during the holidays, a couple must follow the demands of their faceless tormentor if they want to survive. 2023

A mechanic's path crosses with that of his boss's daughter, a beautiful and brainy redhead. Ben recognises her, but Linda doesn't know who Ben is. Worried that he will not be good enough for her, he tells her that he is in a band…
This intense thriller is driven by Nicolas Cage's terrifying portrayal of a carjacker who kidnaps and forces an expectant father to drive - leading to a wild ride. 2023
An animated fantasy musical about a young dragon who must take on an evil snowman with the help of the beautiful ice princess, Lilli.
A delightful animated movie about friendship and loyalty. Tabby McTat and his busker friend Fred charm crowds with their harmonious duets until an unexpected separation tears them apart.
A queen steals a necklace and kill its owner. Her daughter is about to be crowned queen but only if she sees a man tat will marry her. Will her dream come true?
Homemaker Megan's life is thrown into turmoil when it emerges that her husband faces a prison sentence for tax evasion.

column2: TAD: THE LOST EXPLORER AND THE EMERALD TABLET
column6: An adventure-filled animation. After Tad accidentally unleashes a curse that endangers his friends, he sets out to reverse it. 2022
Million thinks his wife is cheating on him and he starts an affair outside their marriage. This decision is about to ruin them as million pays a spy to kill his wife.
Tamara's world is shattered as she discovers that her boyfriend of four years is getting married to another woman he has been seeing for only six months.
Bella's past trauma and fear of intimacy deter suitors until her mother's health scare prompts her to reconsider marriage, facing her fears head-on.
Driven by greed and wickedness, Christy kills her husband to claim all his possessions. However, her victory is short-lived.
An intriguing, unpredictable crime drama. A resentful man arranges a fake kidnapping of his brother, but he doesn't know that the men he's hired aren't planning on faking it.
A notorious group of criminals find themselves up against a hardened detective when they attempt to pull off one last heist.
Ekene gets tired of the village life and decides to search for greener pastures. Things become worrisome when his employer becomes his worst enemy.
Vanessa is the only daughter of her average single mother, while growing up, she lives a reckless life.
Life catches up with a lady as she is forced to marry someone against her wish despite the trauma she has as a teenager.
A terrifying supernatural horror. A group of teens discover they are able to contact spirits using a mysterious embalmed hand, only for things to go too far. 2022
Two friends find themselves attracted to the same man, so they come up with a plan to woo him to see who he will choose for a relationship.
Aunty Elsie is impossible. She is by far the naughtiest and biggest rebel of all the residents at the retirement home. Her children placed her there 10 years ago.
A lady's attitude, which she got from her father, is one of perpetual angst and throwing tantrums over the smallest things. things change when she meets a man who understands her.
After a lady is duped in Australia, she decides to journey down to Nigeria to search for the man that left her.
When the richest man in a village decides to marry a girl, he goes the extra mile. This love leads to tears and sorrow as he destroys her family.
After blackmailing a woman in the city just to ruin her home, a man is caught and later sent to jail. Little did he know that all he did was within the family.
Mark Wahlberg's best friend is a living, breathing and foul-mouthed teddy bear in this very adult comedy that was nominated for an Academy Award.
Mark Wahlberg and Seth MacFarlane team up again for an insane furry sequel. Ted and his new wife want a family, but first, he must prove that he's a person in a court of law.

column2: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem
column6: Everyone's favourite crime-fighting reptiles return. The turtles work to earn the love of New York while facing down an army of mutants.
Tega the bus conductor is about to have a changed destiny after her stubbornness gets her a man who will love her against all odds and her stubbornness.
After a failed marriage, a woman bewitches a young man in order to keep him devoted to her.
A displaced man mysteriously ends up in a brutal prison but is thought to be missing on the outside. He must define his place in this vicious new world if he is to survive.

Anna Stubblefield was an esteemed university professor who became embroiled in a controversial affair with Derrick Johnson, a non-verbal man with cerebral palsy. A dark true crime documentary from Sky.
Ukeje and his daughter Nsogbu are once a shadow over the community. Their thievery is a constant blight, leaving a trail of empty pockets and violated trust.
Chibueze always thinks he comes from the best family until he lost everything he has, now it is time to truly know who truly loves him.
A cheating husband decides to cheat more on his wife; thinking his wife is also cheating on him.
A touching and gritty South African drama about choices and consequences. When a sex worker falls pregnant she tries fights to change her life, but can she escape it.
Michael and Sofia have a good relationship until a friend places a bet with his music executive friend Don P to lure Sofia.
A heart-wrenching South African drama. Follow Thando, a high school girl who is lured into a life filled with blessers, violence, peer pressure, bullying, and so much more.
Leonard finds himself torn between his love for Monique and Kaka. His indecisiveness about who to commit to eternally leaves everyone wondering who he will ultimately choose.
No one is safe in this holiday-themed slasher. A serial killer embarks on a murder spree in Plymouth following a tragic Black Friday riot at the town's superstore. 2023
When a young nurse discovers promising love, her life feels complete. Yet, the wheel of temptation spins, casting a shadow over her newfound marital bliss.
After a CEO's fling with a hotel cleaner, karma strikes when the cleaner's roommate reveals the affair, leading to a rollercoaster of trust, betrayal, and redemption.

When her best friend passes away tragically, a woman steps up to help the husband tackle parenthood without his beloved wife. This decision takes them on a journey that might change the course of their lives forever.
A formidable female ensemble propels this spy thriller. Four female spies team up to retrieve a top-secret weapon when it falls into the wrong hands.
Steve Carell leads a great cast in this comedy. A nerd is taunted by his friends because he is a forty year old virgin, but the pressure only mounts when he meets a single mother. 2005
An adventure-filled animation. Aura is at the academy to learn how to use her magic, but she discovers that the school has many dark secrets that she must uncover.
Ebuka is accidentally crowned king in his kingdom, but this mistake will the greatest mistake ever made by the gods.
Matt Damon challenges his own fate in this sci-fi thriller. An up-and-coming politician falls for a ballet dancer. But shadowy forces threaten to keep them apart.
Desmond Dube and Nomsa Buthelezi star in this hilarious family film. After meeting a mysterious Kung Fu master, Doris becomes a crime fighter.
A feel-good animation. A goofy streetwise cat has the perfect money-making scam that involves a dumb-looking, pipe-playing kid and a horde of strangely literate rats.
Andrew Garfield returns for a second round of web-slinging action.  Dangerous new enemies and family secrets weigh heavy on young Peter Parker as he struggles with his destiny. 2014
Andrew Garfield stars as the webslinger in this revamped superhero instalment that sees a young Peter Parker discovering his newfound abilities and uncovering his mysterious past. 2012

A delightfully fun animation based of the hit video games that took this world by storm. An island populated with happy flightless birds is visited by mysterious pigs, and the only angry bird on the Island is suspicious of them. 2016
This fast-paced, funny sequel is led by a starry voice cast consisting of Rachel Bloom and Leslie Jones. The pigs and birds put their past behind them to fight against an enemy. 2019
A prince escapes the cold hands of death and ends up in the hands of his one true love. Little did he know that those that plan his plot are withing his household.
A thought-provoking, chilling psychological thriller. Two women flee into the New Mexican desert to escape an insidious cult. However, they feel its leader is following them. 2022
Steve and his friends' bachelor getaway at an Airbnb turns into a chilling ordeal as their peaceful retreat unravels into fear and unsettling ambiguity.
An adventure-filled animation. While on holiday with his dog family, Kid is eager to play with his siblings, but they are too busy. Luckily, Kid finds new friends: Cats.
A fun musical animation. The Barkers dream of becoming famous. When Kat becomes their neighbour, not only friendship but also rivalry develops between them. 2023
A revenge-filled thriller driven by Jason Statham. A former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as Beekeepers is on a brutal campaign for vengeance. 2024
Friendships are tested in this romcom starring Taye Diggs. A man's autobiographical 'tell-all' book exposes his friends' secrets putting his friend's wedding in jeopardy
Dolph Lundgren and Luke Wilson star in this action film in which a wedding turns into a hostage situation. The best man, groom, and their drunken pal must save the day.
Taye Diggs, Morris Chestnut and the crew return for the sequel to the hit film, The Best Man. But, if they are all want to get along, they must first settle old differences.

column2: The Best Worst Love Story Ever Told
column6: After a love prayer gone wrong, two best friends desperate for love run against time to get their men back when an unexpected switch happen.
Jim Cummings drives this dark comedy thriller. An engaged Hollywood agent's life is upended when he accepts an anonymous invitation to a no-strings-attached sexual encounter.
This Coen Brothers-directed cult classic stars Jeff Bridges as an ordinary "dude" drawn into a web of deceit after a case of mistaken identity. It's dark humour at its best. 1998
A gang of human traffickers trooped into the country with the intention to send people abroad but ends up putting them to slavery.
Vinnie Jones leads this crime thriller. A high-stakes money laundering deal between London mobsters and a West Virginia oilman turns sour after an incident.
The devil gives in hundreds and takes back in thousands, the billionaire ladies sell their lives for wealth and pay dearly.
A lady sold her soul and sacrificed her father for money. Little does she know that her father's soul is not happy with her.
Meg pays five million for Vera's bride price, and her job when Vera becomes a widow is to continue to sleep with the dead body of the man that will be called her husband.
Fans of Scream will enjoy this viciously funny slasher film. Seven friends must rely on their street smarts and horror movie knowledge when trapped in a cabin with a vindictive killer. 2023
Chimtualam the blind girl gets help from Ikemba, that is how she falls in love with him and gives him her crowned birth right, but he would leave her for her sworn enemy.
A brother's scorn for his brother could cause unrepairable damage, but the bond that keeps them makes forgiveness inevitable.
Denzel Washington and Angelina Jolie face a great evil in this crime thriller. A paralyzed forensics expert and a young cop must work together to stop a brutal serial killer. 1999
Melissa McCarthy gives a savage act in this riotous comedy. A titan of the industry goes to prison for insider trading. On her release, she tries to mend the bridges she burnt. 2016
A strict boss who forced out some assistance to resigned because of his attitude and try to stifle Sophia for getting the praise. His goal is to expose Sophia's academic deceit.
In this action comedy, Jennifer Aniston and Gerard Butler give a new meaning to the term dysfunctional couple when a bounty hunter learns that his next target is his ex-wife. 2010
Matt Damon stars in this film that expertly blends smarts, emotion and gritty action. A man wakes up with amnesia, and learns he's a human weapon the CIA wants eliminated. 2002
Jeremy Renner joins this gripping franchise. When the names of all the black ops agents are threatened with exposure, the agency tries to get rid of everyone on the list. 2012
The second in this highly successful action franchise, sees Matt Damon reprise his role as a former CIA assassin. This time he's forced to resume his former life after being framed. 2004
In this three-time Oscar winner, the iconic Bourne trilogy reaches a riveting climax as Jason Bourne looks for the origins of his life as a trained killer.
An intimate portrait of a 9-year-old sociopath's growing fascination with death.
Jennifer Lopez stars in this gripping thriller. After being cheated on, a married woman begins an affair with her neighbour's son, but it takes a dark and dangerous turn.
Former real-life couple Vince Vaughn and Jennifer Aniston play a once-happy twosome who go to war after breaking up, with things getting nastier by the day. 2006
Eva is out to dare courtesy, demanding nothing but a pound of flesh from Owen, who has made her beautiful life miserable..
Nonso did Ngozi wrong, gets her pregnant and dumps her for a city girl. Now, he is about to see pain like never before.
After Chijioke's dad dies due to his arrogant life and selling up his fathers properties, he refuse to let the burial hold because his brothers are not involved.
Stakes are high in this pulsating action-thriller about a butcher who is granted nine days by the Angel of Death to avenge his family - and bring her nine souls in exchange for his daughter's life.
After her infidelity-expose segment triggers a hostage situation, a hard-headed egoistical radio host must talk down an angry soldier from killing his wife and children live on air. 2023
Oscar Isaac drives this thrilling action drama. An ex-military interrogator turned gambler has a chance at redemption, but he soon finds himself faced with the ghosts of his past.
In a cult, a lady holds a position of endless wealth and greatness, sustained if her son remained unmarried and live with her forever.
Ryan Reynolds and Jason Bateman have a chance to be in each other's shoes in this crazy comedy. Two men, one a party animal and the other a family man, mysteriously switch bodies.
Vin Diesel (Furious 7) reprises his role as Riddick for this pulsating sequel to the cult classic. He battles the Necromongers, an evil empire intent on ruling the universe.
A village tailor arrives in the city to celebrate Christmas with his educated and successful fiancee, but he is shamed and sent out as she plans for her celebrity wedding.
She was in love with him, he wanted a Kidney from her, she agreed only on the condition that he signs a document to marry her once he  survives.
A terrifying horror. Max and Drew run an online show where they perform fake exorcisms, but their fortunes take a turn when a real demon takes over and terrorises their crew.
A bold take on a beloved classic. A woman faces hardships in her life, but finds extraordinary strength in the unbreakable bonds of sisterhood.
A touching and powerful documentary that follows the son of Auschwitz commandant, Rudolf Höss, as he confronts his father's horrific legacy.
King Nebolisa sets up his daughters with two young men just to know how they can handle real life situations, but things go south as the plans take a new turn.
After the death of his wife, widower Justin Quayle's quest for answers leads him to explosive secrets.

Gbenro and Aisha find true love in a whirlwind romance. They must convince their families they're not rushing into disaster. They attend marriage counselling to prove their love, but soon learn love is only one of 10 steps to marriage.
Scarlet's love life changed for good after a plane crash that takes her face, and she has to undergo a plastic surgery. This shocks her husband Nater as he questions her new identity.
A star-studded cast ensures this Academy Award-nominated classic will amuse adults and kids alike. A prehistoric family goes on the journey of a lifetime

Nicolas Cage, Emma Stone, and Ryan Reynolds are among the talented voice cast that drives this sequel which sees the prehistoric family look for a better place to live, only to be met by the biggest challenge yet: another family. 2020
A comic book-inspired revenge thriller with a supernatural twist. A man is brought back to life by a crow a year after he and his fiancée are murdered to avenge their death.
Revenge is calling yet again. This time, the spirit of the Crow resurrects a man seeking to wreak bloody vengeance upon the gang who killed him and his son.
The fourth instalment of the Crow franchise. A resurrected ex-convict seeks revenge against a satanic cult that murdered his girlfriend.
Donald, a rich local business man has a long time crush on Sandra but his love for tradition and respects got in the way of anything happening between them.
He lost his wife and decides to stay unmarried, but the pressure of his mom leads him to bring in a devil into the house.
Mira forgets to return Kelvin's cup, and when he notices, an argument sparks over her response, nearly tearing their home apart.
A mystery-filled horror. A couple moves to a quaint Midwestern town. When their daughter seems to be threatened with eternal damnation, the family turns to a Native American seer
Hungry for truth Professor recruits a group of researchers to investigate Myths surrounding the Legendary Cwezi Dynasty.
In this remarkable documentary, director Antoine Fuqua examines COVID-19's unexpected impact on sports and the subsequent social unrest and protests for racial justice.
Richard buries Chinedu's father by mistake, now the dead will not rest until it sees its final resting place.
In a village, the tradition dictates that once a woman loses her husband, she cannot marry another man. Yolan is bound by this custom, destined to remain unmarried until her death.
Vince Vaughn is caught in a dilemma of epic proportions in this comedy about morals and friendship. A man discovers that his best friend's wife is having an affair.
A terrifying deep-water thriller. Two sisters go diving at a remote location. One of the sisters is struck by a rock, leaving her trapped 28 meters below, fighting for her life.
Obi swears never to forgive his father when he lost his mom 15 years ago, now he must look away from the past and save his father from the clutching arms of Mariam.
A witty, funny lockdown romcom. Two exes are forced to continue living together when a COVID-19 stay-at-home order is issued. 2021
Jodie Comer's performance propels this compelling story of a family's survival. As flood waters submerge London, a mother and child are forced to leave home in search of safety.
When a man is confused about his heart, he makes mistakes that can not be redeemable.
A man who believes he has put his mysterious past behind him cannot stand idly by when he meets a young girl under the control of ultra-violent Russian gangsters. 2014
Denzel Washington reprises his role as the hard vigilante Robert McCall. This time, he is pushed to his limit when he seeks justice and revenge for someone he loved and lost.
Denzel Washington takes his uniquely brutal brand of justice to Italy in this third and final chapter. He fights to free the locals from the grasp of a mafia.
Nimi unknowingly assumes Cash is an escort due to the situation that occurred the first time they met. Nimi finally realize his misconception about Cash, but there might be an obstacle.
An all-star cast drives this crazy comedy about family greed. Two sisters try to win over their wealthy aunt in hopes of inheriting, but their family members also have the same idea.
An accidental death leads to stolen identity when a woman coerces her husband to assume her dead ex's identity. Their desperate cover-up spirals into obsession. 2022
A terrifying sequel to the 1973 film about a 12-year-old girl who is possessed by a mysterious demonic entity. Her mother is forced to seek the help of two priests to save her. 2023
Renowned filmmaker Steven Spielberg helms this drama. A young man discovers a shattering family secret and explores how the power of movies helps us see the truth.
A marvelously crazy mixture of action, comedy and romance. A stuntman must track down a missing movie star, solve a conspiracy and try to win back the love of his life. 2024
The deity of a land is sold and this is causes the death of all young men in every family before thirty years. Now, they must come together to break this curse and fight the one behind it.
Michelle Adeyemi suffers an ailment that leaves her with a few months to live. She begins plans to put her life in order and getting her unlucky-in-love daughter hooked.
Vin Diesel and the late Paul Walker star in this high octane street race film. A cop goes undercover to infiltrate a street racing crew and bust a hijacking ring. 2001

column2: The Fast And The Furious: Tokyo Drift
column6: Justin Lin adds a new flavour to this thrilling franchise. A troubled teen is sent to live with his dad in Tokyo, where he learns about drifting. 2006
A gripping and tragic documentary about Jessi Combs, a professional racer and television personality who set out to break new records in racing.
Bonds are tested in this high-octane instalment of the Furious franchise. A mysterious woman seduces Dom into a world of terrorism, leading him to betray the family.
Sir Anthony Hopkins won a Best Actor Oscar for his role in this poignant drama. An old man refuses all assistance from his daughter begins to doubt his loved ones, his own mind. 2020
An ambitious young man, Arnold, teams up with a faded retired football star, Masembe, with the aim of winning the national tournament.

In a dystopian future, a troubled model takes an illicit new drug at a party and suffers a shocking transformation. With a dangerous gang and authorities hot on her heels, she discovers she may be the key to saving the human race.
Ezra Miller breaks time and space in this superhero epic. Barry Allen uses his super speed to change the past, but his attempt to save his family has unforeseen circumstances. 2023
The atrocities of a king remain after his death, which leaves the kingdom in disaster and his corpse unburied until justice is served.
John Goodman, Rosie O'Donnell and a great cast bring this cartoon classic to life. Fred gets an executive position at his company, but he soon learns that money isn't everything. 1994

column2: The Flintstones In Viva Rock Vegas
column6: Fred Flintstone and the gang return in the sequel of the live-action version of a classic cartoon. This time the Flintstones and the Rubbles go to Rock Vegas. 2000
A compelling survival thriller. When a horde of giant, hungry alligators infests a Louisiana police station during a massive hurricane, prisoners and guards must fight for their lives. 2023
Jackie Chan thrills in this action-packed crime drama. After his daughter is killed in a terrorist attack, a man embarks on a revenge mission to uncover the killers' identities. 2017

column2: The Gangster, The Cop, The Devil
column6: Adapted from real events, the story is about a special police team fighting underground criminal organisations with wit and bravery, finally wiping out the enemy.
Ima, a young and ambitious lawyer, torn between her studies in the UK and taking over her father's vast empire. She must find love and a Hero to safeguard her father's assets.

Garfield, the world-famous, Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, is about to have a wild outdoor adventure! An unexpected reunion with his long-lost father - scruffy street cat Vic, forces Garfield and Odie into a high-stakes heist.
A talented young footballer from an underprivileged background puts her football scholarship at risk when she tries to fit in at her posh private school.  2023
Jonathan Rhys Meyers drives this intense thriller. A typical evening becomes a nightmare for two neighbours when they are involved in a hit-and-run.
A single dad and his daughter move from Abuja to Lagos, only to discover that their landlord and neighbor are unexpected figures from his past.
This movie is a recipe for love. Julian and Brianna, old rivals from baking school, meet again in a TV competition, having separate plans on how to win. 2022
Acclaimed filmmaker Yimou Zhang helms this historical fantasy starring Matt Damon. An elite force of warriors must save humanity from a horde of monstrous creatures.
Following her mother's murder, a desperate Kare must stand against a monopoly corporation that is determined to destroy her mother's forest.
Benedict Cumberbatch takes on the iconic role in this rendition of the classic tale. The super grumpy Grinch plots to ruin Christmas for the villagers of Whoville. 2018
Two beautiful women falls in love with a successful young man, now he must make his decision on who to spend his lifetime with.
A cunning mouse goes for a walk in the forest and outwits a succession of predators.
A little Gruffalo ignores her father's warnings and tiptoes into the snow, searching for the Big Bad Mouse.
After a few years abroad, a young wife returns home with a different idea of marriage and wifely duties.
Aniegbu and Ngebe's mother were both witches, and have given their children as sacrifices to their coven, now it is time for the harvest.
Lady who works in a dry-cleaning outfit, falls in love with the fragrance exuding out from a customer's dirty cloth and then makes frantic efforts to meet the customer.
In a quest to have his other brothers back against all odds, hatred and jealousy tend to stand on his way as it won't let peace reign.
A young prince is called from a far land to come and take over his father's throne, but the power at home awaits his arrival so they can destroy him.
A bank robber dressed as Santa holds up a bank, a child disillusioned with Christmas encounters a man in the woods who, also dressed as Santa, claims to have fallen out of his sleigh.
A greedy rat travels the highway in search of other animals' food.

The ninety-minute film offers extraordinary access to boxing hero Ricky Hatton, exploring his life in and outside of the ring, with honest words from 'The Hitman' himself, his closest friends, family and peers.
Alexander Payne teams up with Paul Giamatti to tell a warm-hearted holiday tale. A cranky New England school instructor is forced to babysit a handful of students during Christmas.
A delightful holiday romcom. To satisfy her publisher, a dating coach must prove her advice works by making a man fall for her by Christmas Eve in 12 days.
Anna Faris stars in this crazy, zany comedy. A Playboy bunny is kicked out of the Playboy Mansion. She must now find a job and a new life.
Based on the wildly popular young adult novels, Jennifer Lawrence stars as a fierce young woman who saves her sister by taking her place in a game of death.
Jennifer Lawrence returns in this action sequel, based on the bestselling young adult novels. Katniss and Peeta must face off against their enemies in a deadly new arena.
In the final instalment of the franchise, Jennifer Lawrence returns as Katniss, who prepares for a showdown that will change the future.
Jennifer Lawrence returns for the final chapter of the series set in a dystopian future. Katniss leads the rebellion as they take the war to the Capitol. 2015
The story of a hunter who her grandmother told she is the reason why she is rejecting all her suitors, and decides to marry a hunter too.
Evil returns in this visually stunning sequel to the edgy adaptation of Snow White. Chris Hemsworth battles two sinister sisters: Charlize Theron and Emily Blunt. 2016
Liam Neeson leads this riveting film about a diamond mine that collapses in Canada. A 'big-rig' road driver leads a rescue mission over a frozen lake to save some trapped miners.
Brian Cox and John Cena star in this enthralling crime thriller. A young journalist discovers a conspiracy that could change the Presidential election and the country's fate.
A fun adventure tale of friendship and imagination. A runaway puppet and an abandoned stuffed animal toy cross paths and go on an epic adventure that will transform their lives.
